text:
Biden's energy regulations will hurt blue collar workers & their families.
 
Biden has pledged to end fossil fuel subsidies & phase out the use of fossil fuels entirely. Removing fossil fuel subsidies will hurt low-income regions that depend on lower-cost energy.
